page.title: 05SHOPS
page.content: There are eleven shops in{BIRDSFOOT {LANE WARDEN HILL}LUTON.They include hardware,wool,clothing,bakers, geengrocers,bookmakers,butchers,off licence,newsagent,hairdressers, launderette and a small supermarket. The off-licence,laundrette and newsagent open on Sundays. Wednesday is early closing day but 5 shops stay open.(The hardware,bookmakers, off-licence, newsagent,and launderette) There is a car parking area in front of the shops and a delivery road at the back of the shops.{THE SHOPS ON THE A6} There is a sub-post office in a general store.On the other side of the road there are two shops selling newspapers,sweets etc. and a garden/pet shop.There are 2 self service garages selling petrol, car parts, garden furniture,games, cigarettes & sweets.
